meta.title: Sapphire FUE Hair Transplant - Advanced Hair Restoration
meta.description: Experience the latest in FUE hair transplant technology with sapphire blades for minimal scarring and natural-looking results.

title: Sapphire FUE Hair Transplant
description: Sapphire FUE is an advanced hair transplantation technique that uses specially designed sapphire blades for more precise and less traumatic incisions.
preparation: Stop smoking at least one week before surgery
Don't drink alcohol 3 days before procedure
Get adequate rest before the surgery
Wear comfortable clothing on surgery day
recovery: Rest for 24-48 hours after the procedure
Sleep with head elevated for first week

items.question: What is Sapphire FUE?
items.answer: Sapphire FUE is a hair transplant technique that uses sapphire blades for more precise incisions.

items.question: How long does recovery take?
items.answer: Recovery typically takes 7-10 days, with most patients returning to normal activities within a week.

items.question: Are the results permanent?
items.answer: Yes, Sapphire FUE provides permanent, natural-looking results.
